page.prototype: .SetItemFromFile as L (Source as C, ContentType as C, TargetPath as C [, Offset as N [, Length as N]])

argument.name: Source
argument.description: The file that contents are copied from.

argument.name: TargetPath
argument.description: The item in the Storage container to set the contents.

argument.name: Offset
argument.description: Default = 0. Offset into the file where copying should begin. A value of 0 will start copying at the beginning of the file.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: Default = -1. The amount of data to copy. If -1, all data is copied starting at the offset.

return.name: Result
return.description: Returns .T. if the operation succeeds, otherwise .F. (see .CallResult for additional error information.)

page.description: Copies a file to the specified Storage item..
page.example:
dim CallResult as CallResult dim Container as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(Container, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
? Container.SetItemFromFile("c:\temp\MyItem.jpg", "MyItempath/MyItem.jpg") =.T.
